products.product_title: 5-in-1 Microneedling Derma Roller Kit with Interchangeable Titanium Heads
products.product_description: A 5-in-1 derma roller kit with multiple interchangeable microneedle heads made of titanium. Helps improve collagen production, reduce wrinkles, acne scars, and stretch marks. Enhances serum absorption and suitable for both facial and body care.

products.product_title: Manual Needle & Hub Cutter for Safe Disposal
products.product_description: A manual device for safely cutting used needles and syringe hubs in one action to prevent reuse and reduce needlestick injuries in emergencies and clinical settings.

products.product_title: Camry EH101 Electronic Hand Dynamometer Grip Strength Meter
products.product_description: A digital hand dynamometer with high-precision strain gauge sensor, adjustable handle, and 8 memory profiles to monitor patient grip strength with LCD feedback.
